name: Yes, my master!
description:
You are a Skeleton, brought back to life by a necromancer. Your master give you a mission, what is it is something only you know, but you must complete it, even if that means dying one more time!

Yes, my master! isTTRPG that fits in your wallet! With a business card size you can carry it whenever your go out! All you need to play is this card and a coin.

For a easier time reading on a Smartphone you can download the yes, my master smartphone.pdf.

This game was made for the Pleasure-not-business Card RPG Jam.
